definition: stable prices/commodity prices fixed by government (in a command economy)/to valorize (a commodity)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: We will do our Best to make Both the market Brisk and prices staBle.
sentences.chinese: 我們要力求做到既繁榮市場，又穩定物價。

sentences.english: The government must act to firm prices up.
sentences.chinese: 政府必須採取措施穩定物價。

sentences.english: We promoted price stability and alleviated price irrationality.
sentences.chinese: 促進穩定物價和緩解價格矛盾。

sentences.english: Wen: Beijing's top priority is price stability.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶:中國的首要任務是穩定物價。
